Welcome

It is the mission of the Wichita Grizzlies Non-Profit Youth Foundation to develop and empower today’s youth with confidence, determination, accountability and integrity, so they can live a productive and prosperous tomorrow. Our goal is to teach young athletes respect for themselves, their peers and their community by instilling a code of ethics built on integrity, responsibility and teamwork.

Together, our players, families, and volunteers work with unyielding commitment to cultivate a safe and disciplined environment so every child can reach their full potential, develop their talent, and increase their skills on and off the field and more importantly… life.

×

News

Registration Information: $25 Fee Discount Deadline
  • Base fee is $325 (includes full navy blue uniform)
  • If you have your navy jersey and pants from last season and they still fit (must fit over shoulder pads) the fee is reduced to $275
  • If you only need a new navy jersey, the reduced fee is $310
  • If you only need new navy pants, the reduced fee is $305
  • There are two upgraded helmet options being offered this year. One option will be an additional $25 and the other will be an additional $50. If you choose to upgrade your helmet, the selection MUST BE MADE AT THE FITTING.
  • All registrations completed and fees paid in full by June 1, will receive an additional $25 discount
  • Use this link to download the registration forms
Fundraising Information:
  • ABOUT: The boys will be selling $5 raffle tickets for prizes and gift baskets (details on gifts will be sent soon). We will need a handful of boys to volunteer for each of the days. They will wear their football jersey and stand in front of the store to fund raise. An adult will be present at all times. Boys are also encouraged to sell raffle tickets to friends and family.
  • WHEN: The weekends of May 4-5 and May 18-19 from 10am-2pm.
  • WHERE:
    • May 4-5 at Sams (3084 N Maize Rd, Wichita, KS 67205)
    • May 18-19 at Walmart (10600 W 21st St, Wichita, KS 67205)
  • SIGN-UP: Please contact Tiffany as soon as possible to let her know which day your son can participate.
Other Notes:
  • Remember to download and sign-up on Team App. Then, search for "Wichita Grizzlies 2028". This will be the team's primary form of communication.
  • You can add the "Wichita Grizzlies 2028 Football" calendar to your own set of Google calendars by using the link in the lower right-hand corner of the calendar within the "schedule" page on this site.
May 5, 2019: First Day of Conditioning (5 - 7 pm)
